hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOVI.EOII_ID, EOVI.CREATOR, EOVI.CREATE_TIME, EOVI.MODIFIER, EOVI.MODIFY_TIME, EOVI.REC_VER, EOVI.REC_STATUS, EOVI.ORG_ID, EOVI.EOII_ORDER_NO, EOVI.EOII_LOGISTIC_NO, EOVI.EOII_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOVI.EOII_WORK_NO, EOVI.EOII_LOT_NUM, EOVI.EOII_SKU_CODE, EOVI.EOII_SKU_NAME, EOVI.EOII_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOVI.EOII_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOVI.EOII_WH_CODE, EOVI.EOII_WH_NAME, EOVI.EOII_EXPECTED_TYPE, EOVI.EOII_EXPECTED_TIME, EOVI.EOII_EXPECTED_QTY, EOVI.PM_CODE from EO_ONWAY_INV_ITEM EOVI where 1=1 <<and EOVI.REC_STATUS =:recStatus>> <<and EOVI.ORG_ID =:orgId>> <<and EOVI.EOII_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoiiOrderNo>> <<and EOVI.EOII_LOGISTIC_NO LIKE :eoiiLogisticNo>> <<and EOVI.EOII_LOT_NUM in (:eoiiLotNum)>> <<and EOVI.EOII_SKU_CODE in (:eoiiSkuCode)>> <<and EOVI.EOII_CUSTOMER_CODE LIKE :eoiiCustomerCode>> <<and EOVI.EOII_WH_CODE LIKE :eoiiWhCode>> <<and EOVI.EOII_EXPECTED_TYPE LIKE :eoiiExpectedType>>
